summary: Laura Ingalls Wilder  was an American writer.
full_text:
Laura Ingalls Wilder  was an American writer known for the Little House on the Prairie series of children's novels  based on her childhood in a settler family.
During the 1970s and early 1980s, the television series Little House on the Prairie was loosely based on the Little House books, and starred Melissa Gilbert as Laura Ingalls and Michael Landon as her father, Charles Ingalls.
title: Laura Ingalls Wilder
